title: Mind-blowing purchase
review:
It's been a week since I am using this awesome thing...I would say I am fully satisfied with the it's performance and worth every penny..

Camera: Rear camera (13+5 MP) can take some really sharp pictures. Impressed with depth mode pics(takes 2 secs to capture).Front cam(8MP) can take good selfie in low light.

Dolby Atmos: With good pair of headphones and HD music you get...lost..mobile loud speaker is just average n has some noise in full volume

Decent Battery backup: 18hrs of battery backup With 2 hrs of video streaming,1 hr of music,browsing occasionally,connected to 4g all time.No heating issues while charging.

Display is crisp n clear,with nougat the  UI experience is really smooth.Since doesn't have light sensor it's difficult to operate mobile in sunlight.

Performance: Till now didn't noticed any lag while playing games or while using multiple windows(8 to 10). Although 3GB(2.7GB usable) RAM is fair enough  but it's not sufficient if you are a gamer.

Storage: only 24GB is available out of 32GB storage.No Facebook,whatsapp,insta etc are pre-installed.Dedicated slot for memory card which supports upto 128GB(finally you are getting rid of hybrid slot).

Finally..if you are looking for good camera phone with great music,decent battery you can just buy it without second thought..

title: Value-for-money
review:
Writing this review after 48 hours of using it.


Pros

Screen: It's a full HD screen with beautiful colour saturation, perfect brightness and amazing viewing angles.

Battery: My phone initially was dead or of the box, I had to charge it up first to use it. It charged to a full 100 in 2.5 hours... In which, it charged upto 35 in half an hour. I used it mainly for internet and videos, played a few games just to check the graphic performance and after one whole day (24 hours) I was left with 20% battery. It's amazing.

Audio: Dolby Atmos. Enough said. You will know if you have a nice pair of headphones. 

Graphics: played asphalt 8 for 30 mins without any lag at all.

Speed: Didn't do any benchmarks. However, the animation scales, booting up time AND multitasking is smooth as feather. 

Cons

Capacitive buttons: the capacitive buttons on the phone are not backlit, niether are customisable.

Heating: it gets a lil heated while charging and continuous gaming. Wasn't an issue for me but can be for people in extreme conditions.

Camera: BIGGEST con of the phone. The camera takes fine ish photos in outdoors and in day times, but pathetic indoor photos. The torch is eye blinding bright, and I won't recommend this for phone photographers. Front camera is average.

No notification light.

There are two grills at the bottom for speakers but only the right one works. It would have been an amazing experience if both of the speakers worked.

Overall the phone is a bang for buck. You can't possibly get better than this at this price point. 

Cheers.

title: Power packed smartphone out there!!
review:
Okay so let me tell you why I think this is the best smartphone for this price range..

✓Processor and clock speed :
 If you are gadget geek like me than you will probably know how important these terms are when it comes to performance.This one comes with a mediatek processor which is not as good as compared to the Qualcomm Snapdragon but still it's pretty good..only difference is this phone is designed to reload the games if you have them in background and other phones may resume the game(doesn't mean processor is good ) but still I found this little irritating during gaming...rest assured the phone works pretty good and can handle almost any app or game for that matter..

✓Camera : DONT EXPECT GOOD CAMERA HERE.. although it has 13+5 in the back but I am not sure if the second camera does anything..photos are not good in low light conditions and colour perception is poor.. Overall not a phone for you if you are a camera guy

✓Music: yes this phone has Dolby Atmos..the audio through the headphones are crisp and tuned to your preference..I use Sennheiser cx180 in ear phones and this combination is deadly ...I spend hours every day listening to songs and so will you...360 audio clearance is totally awesome..also it as a music key that is basically for playing music but you can program it for a bunch of other things..

✓O.S : this phone runs stock Android Nougat which means it comes without any skins and also promised update to Oreo(don't know when that is going to happen). multitasking is precise.

*Okay so these are the things I look into before purchasing a phone..I got this one for 9k so no complaints at all.. overall the phone is really good and personally I found this phone better than redmi note 4..

title: Wonderful
review:
My full review : ( update : volte is working perfectly in both sum slots !!)

Over all a great device for the price !! But mixed views many pros and some cons 

I bought it in BBD for below 10k !! It's a great deal for that price !! No complaints !!

Pros : 
0: Better signal reception and no call drops !! 
1. Better build quality than redmi devices ( I personally have one so ) 
2. Corning gorilla glass 3 
3. Dual cam ( performance is ok for the price I paid ) 
4. Good performance for medium to high users ( multitasking is just awesome) (Dono about intensive gaming)
 5. Super fast fingerprint scanner ( Better faster and accurate than my RN3 )
6. Great Battery Life ( 3.15 hrs of sot with 35% battery use)(mixed use on 4G/wifi and lil gaming) 
7. GOOD Speaker quality !!! ( Speaker out put is very much satisfactory )( 7/10)
8: Good Display Quality Better than redmi phones I'm damn sure about it !! 
9: assured Oreo Update !! 

Cons : 
1: more internal memory is consumed by OS !! 8 GB is consumed by OS very bad !! (UPDATE : 23.9GB is available for user space so good to go !! )  
2: no led notification light (Update : it is present in between camera and sensor but not usable stupid Moto policy and no Moto display too Maybe provided in future update)
3: Many blaotware around 8 apps all are Microsoft apps and true caller and Skype but can be disabled everything !!  And 2 Lenovo apps they can be disabled and muted !! 
4: headphone audio quality is not so great (midocre output seriously)

Nutral : 
Call quality is good !! Both mic and speaker quality !! But opposite side people say voice is not identifiable I mean not identifiable but Cristal clear !! They can't identify you easily

That's it overall it's a great phone for under 10 k but not worthy for 11K and above seriously !!

Initial Impressions 

Looks : 
It looks sturdy but dono wether it will survive some occasional drops it has Corning gorilla glass in front and the back is slippery like anything so buy a case immediately !! And lil heavy in hands but 4000 mAh battery and metal casing no complaints !! And the phone matches the size of my redmi note 3 !! Even though it's a 5.2 inch screen cud nee becoz of dual cam setup and non hybrid slot !! Kudos Lenovo for that stuff !!

Performance : 
Even though it's a mediatek CPU its just super cool with continuous usage of one to two hours with half brightness and auto brightness on  and 4G connectivity volte enabled which covers a bunch of apps download too 

The phone gets lil warm but you can't hardly notice it ! Very less not noticable !!

Ui : 
UI is pure stock Android raw aosp with some minor tweaks it gives micro lag experience some times shud be UI fault !! Again it won't be a big issues just micron second !! Other than that it's fluid smooth and handles better all apps no Force closes !! I played some basic games great experience no lags and no over heating checked with CPZ , temperature maintained within 40 degrees after 40 minutes of play all mediocre games with medium brightness and auto brightness on and 4G on

Camera : 
I'm not a pro potographer !! For the camera does great in good light conditions and decent in indoor light conditions and noisy in low light conditions !! So obviously budget camera performance !! 

That's it guys !! Hope my review is helpfull but sorry for long discription !! 
 
Regards 
Kesavvel

title: Must buy!
review:
Dear flipkart nd flipkart customers,
        I have placed order to the store INDIFLASHMART for LENOVO K8+ smart phone on September 8th. I received my product on September 11th. When I used my phone in dimlight for the first time with the Adaptive brightness option, I noticed heavy flickering on the display. Then I unchecked the Adaptive brightness option and kept the brightness to the minimum and checked the display, it was flickering continuously. But with brightness as maximum, the display was without any flickering. So to find the reason for this defect, I contacted Lenovo technician through chat through their native site. They suggested to restart the phone and use the phone in safe mode or perform factory reset. I tried both the option but still the defect was not resolved. So I decided to ask for replacement to the seller INDIFLASHMART on September 14 for the above mentioned defect . But I received a mail saying that my request was rejected and they gave the following reply - 

""We are sorry to hear that you are facing a problem in the display for the above mentioned product. 

We request you to follow these simple steps that?ll help to fix your issue. 

Drag down the status bar 
Move the Brightness slider 
OR 
Tap Menu 
Go to Settings 
Select Display 
Tap Brightness Level 
Move the Brightness slider 
If required, turn OFF Adaptive Brightness ""


Is this the way ur sellers respond to ur customers????? The fault is with the phone's display and I was asked to adjust this defect with the settings...

I have purchased nearly 5 to 7 phones from ur site. But this is the first time I am facing the problem like this. I am completely taken back by the irresponsible answer from the seller....
